name: CLP_EOB_CAS_LINE
description: This table holds line-level claim adjustment reason code (CAS) data from the Explanation of Benefits (EOB) master file.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim print database record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_CAS_LN_CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage record ID for the line-level explanation of benefits adjustment.

columns.name: EOB_CAS_CLM_LINE
columns.description: The service line number for the line-level explanation of benefits adjustment.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CAS_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description: The line-level explanation of benefits adjustment group code.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CAS_RMT_CODE
columns.description: The line-level explanation of benefits adjustment reason code.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CAS_AMT
columns.description: The line-level explanation of benefits adjustment amount.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CAS_QTY
columns.description: The line-level explanation of benefits adjustment quantity.
